description.en: Logs tone expression deltas across modular inference layers; supports style drift tracking.
description.zh: 觀察模組層級語氣變化，支援語氣風格偏移追蹤。

trigger.en: When variations in tone activation across modules are detected.
trigger.zh: 當偵測到不同模組層間語氣成分變異時。

enforcement.en: Generates delta logs and triggers annotation module.
enforcement.zh: 產出語氣差異日誌並觸發觀測標註模組。
